name: SheebaBot
description: Telegram Group Management Bot Written In Python Using Pyrogram.

BOT_TOKEN.description: Obtain a Telegram bot token by contacting @BotFather

API_ID.description: API_ID of your Telegram Account my.telegram.org/apps

API_HASH.description: API_HASH of your Telegram Account my.telegram.org/apps

SESSION_STRING.description: Need for Userbot Module So u can execute .sh & .l cmd

SUDO_USER_ID.description: Sudo users have full access to everythin, don't trust anyone... ex:- 123456 654311 123456

LOG_GROUP_ID.description: For logs channel to note down important bot level events, recommend to make this public. ex: '-123456'

ARQ_API_BASE_URL.description: For Music Downloading And Many More Things... Don't change this value

MESSAGE_DUMP_CHAT.description: Chat_id of the group where useless things will go

LOG_MENTIONS.description: Fill 1 to turn this on, or 0 to turn it off.

OWNER_ID.description: Userbot command prefix, Leave it empty if you don't know what that is.

MAIN_CHATS.description: Delay in which RSS will send updates in chat

SUDO_CHAT_ID.description: Pm permit, fill 1 to enable or 0 to disable it.
